name: Ratastic
description:
You follow Ratthew the Rat in a small town of rat folk who seem to think Ratthew is one that has to solve all their problems! Bake treats on the fire, meet new rats and fix everything that's fucked up in this simple 10 minute game.

CONTROLS: 
Arrow keys = Movement
Enter key = Interact
Shift = Run

CONTENT WARNING:
-Contains swearing
-Contains dark humor

[This is my first game i made for fun, and it is made using only RPGMAKER MV coding statements, in the future I may reach to do more original coding mixed with RPGMAKER MV elements. For a first I think this is great, and it really helped me learn the basics.]
